Merge pull request #34 from thoughtbot/master

Add syntax highlighting for PDFs
Use Process::Status#success? instead of checking for zero explicitly

Add syntax highlighting for PDFs

* Requires "verbatim" XSL to be included
* Use saxon instead of xsltproc so xslthl can be included
* Add some color to the syntax highlighting
* Use homebrew specific location for highlighting configuration.
  It was very unhappy with relative paths and wouldn't take the option
  on the java command line :(
* Vendor saxon 6.5 (jar in docbook-xsl doesn't work for some reason)

Restore some sense of sanity to this project

* add bundler
* remove turn, leftright gems since they caused nothing but trouble on 1.9
* get tests passing, thanks to @eee-c not-handbookish branch

Include a cover image in the epub output.

Generate a docinfo file with the cover_image inserted.

tags from
